instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the performance of the IDPF method and how far can this metric go in the bimodal asynchronous BCI?

Therefore, while accuracy is a useful metric, it should be considered alongside other performance metrics to have a comprehensive understanding of the IDPF method's performance.
